results.title: White House floats limited stablecoin rewards in 3rd crypto, bank meeting
results.description: White House crypto adviser Patrick Witt reportedly refocused crypto and bank lobby talks on a crypto bill to allow stablecoin rewards tied to transaction activity.

results.title: Custodia CEO Says Trump Family Crypto Ties Are Part of Clarity Act Problem
results.description: At ETH Denver, Caitlin Long said the ethics controversy around Trump-linked crypto projects has complicated Senate support.

results.title: Crypto miner Bitdeer tanks 17% after $300M debt offering
results.description: Bitdeer has launched its second-ever convertible senior note offering, which has seen its shares tumble 29% so far this year.

results.title: Risk-Off Capital Shifts Toward Tokenized Assets as DeFi Pulls Back
results.description: Capital is rotating out of DeFi into tokenized assets as experts say the shift reflects maturing markets, not capitulation.

results.title: Fed’s Kashkari lashes crypto and stablecoins, praises AI
results.description: Minneapolis Fed President Neel Kashkari says crypto is “utterly useless” compared to AI, and that pro-stablecoin arguments are “a buzzword salad.”

results.title: Illicit stablecoin activity hit 5-year high of $141B in 2025: TRM Labs
results.description: Sanctions evasion networks, guarantee marketplaces, and large-scale money laundering schemes dominated illicit stablecoin use, says TRM Labs.

results.title: Bitcoin selloff due to quantum fears doesn’t add up with Ether flat, says dev
results.description: Bitcoin developer Matt Carallo says Bitcoiners are looking to “blame something” for the asset’s sluggish price, dismissing quantum fears as the culprit.

results.title: Australian Executive Accused of Selling Cyber Secrets to Russia for Crypto
results.description: U.S. prosecutors say the former defense contractor executive took about $1.26 million in crypto to transfer sensitive exploit tools tied to Five Eyes intelligence work.

results.title: AI agents not worth the cost as humans still cheaper: Tech execs
results.description: Tech investor Jason Calacanis says he’s paying around $110,000 annualized to run an AI agent, more than most US salaries, and it’s not running at full capacity.

results.title: White House, Banks and Crypto Groups Resume Talks on Stablecoin Rewards
results.description: Stablecoin incentives remain a key unresolved issue as lawmakers seek to advance digital-asset market-structure legislation.

results.title: Bitcoin options market structure leans toward $60K retest in February
results.description: Bitcoin may stay capped under $70,000 as traders deploy bearish options strategies, and spot BTC ETF outflows point to a retest of the yearly low.

results.title: 'Warhammer' Veteran Jervis Johnson Warns AI Could Become the 'Asbestos of the Internet'
results.description: The longtime Warhammer designer backed Games Workshop’s generative AI ban, arguing the technology undermines creative work.

results.title: Kraken’s xStocks tops $25B in volume with more than 80K onchain holders
results.description: Blockchain-based versions of US stocks are drawing growing investor activity, with onchain wallets and cross-venue trading expanding rapidly.

results.title: AI in Hollywood? 'Silicon Valley' Star T.J. Miller Isn't Worried
results.description: “Silicon Valley” actor T.J. Miller joked that an AI bot “replaced” him as this week’s ETH Denver host, amid actual growing job fears.

results.title: Bitcoin Lightning Network exceeds $1B in monthly volume: Report
results.description: Analysis by Bitcoin services company River forecasts a transaction surge as individuals and businesses experiment with AI agentic payments.

results.title: Bitcoin’s monthly losses break records, but history says a turnaround is brewing
results.description: Bitcoin is on course to lock in another negative month, but one analyst says major differences in the current market structure could be a sign of a pending trend reversal.

results.title: Google Brings AI Music Generation to Gemini—We Tried It, and It's Too Little Too Late
results.description: Google AI music generator Lyria 3 is now available on the Gemini app. It works—mostly—but the competition has a big head start.

results.title: Fed’s Kashkari: Crypto “Utterly Useless,” Stablecoins No Match for Venmo
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Fed’s Kashkari: Crypto “Utterly Useless,” Stablecoins No Match for Venmo Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari delivered another pointed criticism of crypto today. This post Fed’s Kashkari: Crypto “Utterly Useless,” Stablecoins No Match for Venmo first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Ethereum Treasury Sharplink Reports Growing ETH Holdings, Institutional Investment
results.description: Sharplink is shaking up its branding as it reports additional Ethereum holdings and a rising number of institutional investors.

results.title: Senator Warren Urges Treasury and Fed Not to Bail Out Crypto Billionaires Saylor and CZ Amid Bitcoin Slide
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Senator Warren Urges Treasury and Fed Not to Bail Out Crypto Billionaires Saylor and CZ Amid Bitcoin Slide Sen. Elizabeth Warren urged the Treasury Department and the Federal Reserve to rule out any taxpayer-funded intervention to stabilize Bitcoin. This post Senator Warren Urges Treasury and Fed Not to Bail Out Crypto Billionaires Saylor and CZ Amid Bitcoin Slide first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Bitcoin’s Lightning Network Surpasses $1 Billion in Monthly Volume As Adoption Grows
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Bitcoin’s Lightning Network Surpasses $1 Billion in Monthly Volume As Adoption Grows Bitcoin’s Lightning Network topped $1.17 billion in November monthly volume across 5.22 million transactions, according to River Financial, which says the milestone reflects growing adoption despite flat price action. This post Bitcoin’s Lightning Network Surpasses $1 Billion in Monthly Volume As Adoption Grows first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: 'The Sandbox' Adds Web-Based Games in Season 7 Accessibility Push
results.description: Crypto gaming metaverse platform The Sandbox is rolling out its Season 7 content push, making it easier than ever for players to jump in.

results.title: Accenture Is Tracking Whether Employees Use AI—And Promotions Are on the Line
results.description: Consulting giant Accenture is monitoring senior staff logins to AI tools and tying career advancement to adoption rates—all while AI threatens to eliminate jobs.

results.title: Bitdeer Stock (BTDR) Crashes 18% on $300M Convertible Note Offering, Dilution Fears Mount
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Bitdeer Stock (BTDR) Crashes 18% on $300M Convertible Note Offering, Dilution Fears Mount Bitdeer Technologies’ shares slid sharply today after announcing plans to raise $300 million through a private sale of convertible senior notes. This post Bitdeer Stock (BTDR) Crashes 18% on $300M Convertible Note Offering, Dilution Fears Mount first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: CME Plans 24/7 Crypto Futures Trading Starting May 29
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine CME Plans 24/7 Crypto Futures Trading Starting May 29 CME Group will begin offering 24/7 trading for its regulated cryptocurrency futures and options on May 29. This post CME Plans 24/7 Crypto Futures Trading Starting May 29 first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: The UAE Has Quietly Built Up a $453 Million Bitcoin Reserve: Arkham
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine The UAE Has Quietly Built Up a $453 Million Bitcoin Reserve: Arkham Arkham says UAE royal-linked bitcoin miners are holding 6,782 BTC worth $453.6 million, sitting on an estimated $344 million unrealized profit while largely keeping their stash untouched. This post The UAE Has Quietly Built Up a $453 Million Bitcoin Reserve: Arkham first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Voltage Introduces Revolving Credit Line for Bitcoin Settlement, With USD Repayment
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Voltage Introduces Revolving Credit Line for Bitcoin Settlement, With USD Repayment Voltage, a Bitcoin infrastructure provider, launched Voltage Credit, a revolving line of credit that lets businesses send payments over Bitcoin rails with instant settlement in U.S. dollars. This post Voltage Introduces Revolving Credit Line for Bitcoin Settlement, With USD Repayment first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Ledn Sells $188M Bitcoin-Backed Bonds in First-of-Its-Kind Deal
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Ledn Sells $188M Bitcoin-Backed Bonds in First-of-Its-Kind Deal Crypto lender Ledn Inc. has officially sold $188 million in securitized bonds backed by Bitcoin-linked loans. This post Ledn Sells $188M Bitcoin-Backed Bonds in First-of-Its-Kind Deal first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: FutureBit launches Apollo III, U.S.-Engineered Home Bitcoin Miner
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine FutureBit launches Apollo III, U.S.-Engineered Home Bitcoin Miner FutureBit launched the Apollo III today, a new home Bitcoin mining system combining a high-performance miner and a full Bitcoin node in a single desktop device. This post FutureBit launches Apollo III, U.S.-Engineered Home Bitcoin Miner first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Trump Sons Tout a $1 Million Bitcoin Price as Goldman CEO Says He Owns BTC
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Trump Sons Tout a $1 Million Bitcoin Price as Goldman CEO Says He Owns BTC Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr. predicted Bitcoin could reach $1 million as Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon revealed a small personal BTC stake. This post Trump Sons Tout a $1 Million Bitcoin Price as Goldman CEO Says He Owns BTC first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.
